sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8befe79c95dca900da640ba99ece2948
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><client_callable>false</client_callable><description> Usage:
The Initialize method requires the Scheduled Remote File Import GlideRecord.
var importFile = new CSRemoteFileImport(current);
importFile.createEccQueueOutput();</description><name>CSRemoteFileImport</name><script><![CDATA[var CSRemoteFileImport = Class.create();

CSRemoteFileImport.prototype = {
   
   initialize: function(remoteFileImportGR) {
	  /*
      //For documentation on how this post method works check the wiki here:
      //http://wiki.servicenow.com/index.php?title=Importing_Data_Using_Import_Sets
	  //Created by Marcus Fly (marcus.fly@cloudsherpas.com)
	  //Created by Valor Poland (valor.poland@cloudsherpas.com
      */
      this.debug = true; //add a property at later date
      if(!remoteFileImportGR) {
         this.logMsg("Attempted to get file from MID server but no record was defined", 'debug');
         return;
      }
      this.record = remoteFileImportGR;  //set our record to be the current record passed in
   },
   
   createEccQueueOutput : function(){
      this.logMsg("Creating ECC Queue entry for: " + this.record.getDisplayValue() + " instance URL: " + gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri'), 'debug');
      
      var jsProbe = this.getJSProbe();
      jsProbe.create();
      this.record.u_last_run_datetime = gs.nowDateTime();
      this.record.update();
   },
   
   getJSProbe: function () {
      var jsProbe = new JavascriptProbe(this.record.u_mid_server.name);
      //jsProbe.setSource(this.type);
      jsProbe.setName(this.type);
      jsProbe.addParameter("filePath",        this.record.u_file_path);
      jsProbe.addParameter("targetImportSet", this.record.u_import_table.name);
      jsProbe.addParameter("instance",        gs.getProperty("glide.servlet.uri"));
      
      if(this.debug) {
         jsProbe.setParameter("debug", this.debug);
      }
      
      jsProbe.setJavascript("var remoteFileImport = new CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport(); \nremoteFileImport.getRemoteFileAndUploadToInstance()");
      
      return jsProbe;
   },
   
   logMsg : function(message, msgType) {
      var msgSrc = "Remote File Importer";
      if(this.debug && msgType == 'debug') {
         gs.log('DEBUG: ' + message, msgSrc);
      }
      else if(msgType == 'info' || msgType == '') {
         gs.log('INFO: ' + message, msgSrc);
      }
      else {
         gs.print(message);
      }
   },
   
   type: "CSRemoteFileImport"
};

CSRemoteFileImport.filterImportTables = function() {
	//Ref qual to only show import tables	
   var t = new TableUtils("sys_import_set_row");
   var ta = t.getTableExtensions();
   var jst = j2js(ta);
   return 'nameIN' + jst + '';
};]]></script><sys_created_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-04-21 23:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>8befe79c95dca900da640ba99ece2948</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-04-23 23:07:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include><sys_app_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_app/><sys_code>!!9;{/</sys_code><sys_created_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-04-21 23:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>4c4c7f54558aa100a7e5000f49a8f076</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CSRemoteFileImport</sys_name><sys_parent/><sys_path>!!9;{/</sys_path><sys_policy/><sys_source_deleted>false</sys_source_deleted><sys_source_id>8befe79c95dca900da640ba99ece2948</sys_source_id><sys_source_table>sys_script_include</sys_source_table><sys_type>code</sys_type><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8befe79c95dca900da640ba99ece2948</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-04-23 23:07:09</sys_updated_on></sys_app_file></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_include_649cbb289590e900da640ba99ece29e5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Usage:
Script needs to be set in a JavaScriptProbe ECC Queue entry:
var remoteFileImport = new CSRemoteFileImport();
remoteFileImport.getRemoteFileAndUploadToInstance();</description><name>CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport</name><script><![CDATA[var CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport = Class.create();

CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport.prototype = {
   initialize : function () {
      /*
      //For documentation on how this post method works check the wiki here:
      //http://wiki.servicenow.com/index.php?title=Importing_Data_Using_Import_Sets
	  //Created by Marcus Fly (marcus.fly@cloudsherpas.com)
	  //Created by Valor Poland (valor.poland@cloudsherpas.com
      */
      this.debug = probe.getParameter("debug");
      this.logMsg("Starting Cloud Sherpas File Transfer");
      this.probeParameters = this._getProbeParameters();
   },
   
   getRemoteFileAndUploadToInstance: function () {
      var instanceConnectionURL = this._getInstanceConnectionURL();
      var jHttpConnClient  = this._getHttpClient();
      var jHttpPostObj     = this._getHttpPost(instanceConnectionURL);
      var filePartArray    = this._getFileParts();
      var jMultiPartReq    = new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.MultipartRequestEntity(filePartArray, jHttpPostObj.getParams());
      jHttpPostObj.setRequestEntity(jMultiPartReq);

      this._uploadFileToInstance(jHttpPostObj, jHttpConnClient);
   },

   _getInstanceConnectionURL: function () {
      var instanceConnectionURL = this.probeParameters.instance; 
      instanceConnectionURL    += "sys_import.do?sysparm_import_set_tablename=" + this.probeParameters.targetImportSet;
      instanceConnectionURL    += "&sysparm_transform_after_load=true";
      return instanceConnectionURL;
   },

   _getHttpPost: function (instanceConnectionURL) {
      return new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.PostMethod(instanceConnectionURL);
   },

   _getHttpClient : function() { 
      var probeParms = this.probeParameters;    
      this.logMsg("_getHttpClient - instance: " + probeParms.instance + "\ninstanceUser: " + probeParms.instanceUser + 
                  "\ninstancePassword.length: " + probeParms.instancePassword, "debug");
      
      var jHttpClient   = new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient();
      var jInstanceCredentials = new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials(probeParms.instanceUser, probeParms.instancePassword);
      jHttpClient.getState().setCredentials(new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.auth.AuthScope(null, 443, null), jInstanceCredentials);
      
      if (ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.use_proxy") == 'true') {
         this.logMsg("MID Server requires proxy. Setting HTTP Client proxy details", 'debug');
         jHttpClient = this._setProxyInfo(jHttpClient);
      }
      return jHttpClient;
   },   

   _uploadFileToInstance: function(httpPost, httpClient) {
      try {
         var result = httpClient.executeMethod(httpPost);
         this.logMsg("Response status code: " + result, "info");
         this.logMsg("Response body: " + httpPost.getResponseBodyAsString() + "\n\n", "debug");
         
      }
      catch (errorObj) {
         this.logMsg("There was an error trying to upload to the import set " + errorObj.message, "error");
         this.logMsg(errorObj, "error");
      }
      
      httpPost.releaseConnection();
   },

   _getFileParts: function () {
      //Get our file
      this.logMsg("_getFileParts - filePath: " + this.probeParameters.filePath + "\ntargetImportSet: " + this.probeParameters.targetImportSet, "debug");
      var targetFile = new Packages.java.io.File(this.probeParameters.filePath);
      var filePartArray = new Array(new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.methods.multipart.FilePart(targetFile.getName(), targetFile));
      return filePartArray;
   },

   _getInstanceBaseURL: function (instanceParameter) {
      var instanceBase = instanceParameter + '';
      if (instanceBase.indexOf('/') != instanceBase.length -1){
         instanceBase += "/";
      }
      return instanceBase;
   },
   
   _setProxyInfo: function (jHttpClient) {
      var proxyInfo = this._getProxyInfo();
      this.logMsg("_setProxyInfo - hasProxy: " + proxyInfo.hasProxy + "\nproxyHost: " + proxyInfo.proxyHost + "\nproxyPort: " + proxyInfo.proxyPort, "debug");
      jHttpClient.getHostConfiguration().setProxy(proxyInfo.proxyHost, proxyInfo.proxyPort);
      jHttpClient.getState().setProxyCredentials(
         new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.auth.AuthScope(proxyInfo.proxyHost, proxyInfo.proxyPort), 
         new Packages.org.apache.commons.httpclient.UsernamePasswordCredentials(proxyInfo.proxyUser, proxyInfo.proxyPass)
      );
      return jHttpClient;
   },
   
   _getProbeParameters : function() {
      var probeObj = {};
      probeObj.instance          = this._getInstanceBaseURL(probe.getParameter("instance"));
      probeObj.instanceUser      = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.username");
      probeObj.instancePassword  = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.password");
      probeObj.filePath          = probe.getParameter("filePath");
      probeObj.targetImportSet   = probe.getParameter("targetImportSet");
      return probeObj;
   },
   
   _getProxyInfo : function() {
      var proxyObj = {};
      proxyObj.hasProxy  = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.use_proxy");
      proxyObj.proxyHost = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.host");
      proxyObj.proxyPort = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.port");
      proxyObj.proxyUser = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.username");
      proxyObj.proxyPass = ms.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.password");
      return proxyObj;
   },
   
   logMsg : function (message, logType) {
      var prefixStr = "*** CS Remote File";
      if (typeof logType == 'undefined' || logType == 'info' || logType == 'error') {
         ms.log(prefixStr + " " + logType.toUpperCase() + "*** " + message);
      }
      if (this.debug && logType == 'debug') {
         ms.log(" DEBUG *** " + message);
      }
   },
   
   type : 'CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport'
};]]></script><sys_created_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-04-22 19:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>649cbb289590e900da640ba99ece29e5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-04-23 23:06:26</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include><sys_app_file action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sys_app/><sys_code>!!9;`/</sys_code><sys_created_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2014-04-22 19:04:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>ad3c7f54558aa100a7e5000f49a8f044</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CSMIDServerRemoteFileImport</sys_name><sys_parent/><sys_path>!!9;`/</sys_path><sys_policy/><sys_source_deleted>false</sys_source_deleted><sys_source_id>649cbb289590e900da640ba99ece29e5</sys_source_id><sys_source_table>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_source_table><sys_type/><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_649cbb289590e900da640ba99ece29e5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>marcus.fly@CS_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2014-04-23 23:06:26</sys_updated_on></sys_app_file></record_update>
